description: the format method in nova.log.JSONFormatter uses record.processName, which is not always available. That would cause all log activity with JSONFormatter to fail.
title: nova.log.JSONFormatter uses record.processName

comments.content: the format method in nova.log.JSONFormatter uses record.processName, which is not always available. That would cause all log activity with JSONFormatter to fail.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~yunmao

comments.content:
Can you provide an instance where that's the case? If we could narrow down where this happens in practice it would be easier to address.

Thanks.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague

comments.content: I had this problem when I run the tests on my Mac. I guess after upgrading to Lion it went away, and Mac is also not officially supported anyway. So wont-fix is probably the right call.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~yunmao
